userreviews.userReview: This companion guide for older children contains useful facts about such subjects as Cookery, Home Nursing, First Aid, Dressmaking, Knitting and Needlework (including many different types of stitches), Hiking, Camping, Nature Notes, Girl Guiding, Gardening, Music and Sport. There are also sections of general information such as facts and figures about the World, different Languages and the British Commonwealth. Although some sections would now need to be updated, I kept this as a handy reference book for many years when I was no longer a "schoolgirl". It has useful and interesting facts which are still relevant for children today, in a compact little volume.
